title: UK Energy Bills to Rise as Regulator Backs Major Grid Investment
description: The UK energy regulator approved a huge hike in grid investment that will raise customer bills just as the government promises to bring them down.
content:
(Bloomberg) The UK energy regulator approved a huge hike in grid investment that will raise customer bills just as the government promises to bring them down.
